title: Production publish (deploy) instructions for current draft build

requirements.summary: Document and standardize the steps to publish the current draft build to the production site without changing product features.
acceptanceCriteria: The production (live) site is updated to the most recent draft build.
After deployment completes, visiting the production site shows the same behavior/content as the latest draft.

file_operations.description: Add a concise, operator-focused deployment runbook describing how to publish the current draft build to production, including: prerequisites, build step, publish step, rollback guidance, and a post-deploy verification checklist aligning with the acceptance criteria. Reference the selected github-export-icp-cli template/scripts as the intended deployment mechanism where applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
